Class VistaAmbTauler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • views.VistaAmbTauler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, VistaTauler.TaulerListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VistaEditor, VistaJugar

    abstract class VistaAmbTauler
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements VistaTauler.TaulerListener
    Classe generica per a vistes amb panel lateral i tauler redimensionable.
